QuestData.Title: Eye of Azshara: The Tidestone of Golganneth
QuestData.Description: <Now that you have defeated Queen Azshara's Wrath and have the Tidestone in hand, it is time to place it in the Portrait Room of the Chamber of the Guardian in lower Dalaran.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the central teleporter in Dalaran and then place the Tidestone of Golganneth in the Portrait Room of the Chamber of the Guardian.
QuestData.RewardText: <Archmage Khadgar has set aside a space here for the Tidestone of Golganneth, as well as the rest of the Pillars of Creation.>
